reviewText:
As stated on the back-cover of the video itself:

Get a close-up look at the playing of one of today's finest fusion bass players.  In "PROGRESSIVE BASICS," Willis shows you his unique right hand concept.  Learn right hand dampening in the open and closed positions and how to use the correct muscles to boost stamina and develop fast, flowing technique.  Through the strong and weak beat concept, Willis demonstrates how to visualize the harmony underneath your fingers.  He also discusses fretless bass technique.  The video is highlighted by performances including "Self Defense" which has been described in the accompanying booklet.
